bibl.bibl: Origin 3d US ed.: On the origin of species by means of natural selection, or the preservation of favored races in the struggle for life. By Charles Darwin. From the 6th London edition. New York: D. Appleton and Company. 1873.
bibl.idno: Adapted from Kohler’s catalogue, vol. 1, no: 336 (actually 1878, but = Freeman 404, which = Freeman 397 which is 1873 edition). In WorldCat, there’s no consensus on whether it’s On the origin or The origin. Also online with Hathi Trust Digital Library.
